title: 服务器崩溃 XD
author: MisakaFish
txt_content:
如题.似乎是林业的热电子工作台造成的崩溃,好像是什么物品槽检测导致的,不知道该怎么解决....

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Who set us up the TNT?

Time: 2020-05-08 00:52:48 CST
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: forestry.core.utils.ItemStackUtil.isIdenticalItemIgnoreCaps(Lnet/minecraft/item/ItemStack;Lnet/minecraft/item/ItemStack;)Z
    at forestry.factory.recipes.FabricatorRecipeManager.isPlan(FabricatorRecipeManager.java:65)
    at forestry.factory.inventory.InventoryFabricator.canSlotAccept(InventoryFabricator.java:39)
    at forestry.core.inventory.InventoryAdapterRestricted.isItemValidForSlot(InventoryAdapterRestricted.java:27)
    at forestry.core.inventory.InventoryAdapterRestricted.canInsertItem(InventoryAdapterRestricted.java:32)
    at net.minecraftforge.items.wrapper.SidedInvWrapper.insertItem(SidedInvWrapper.java:143)
    at appeng.util.inv.AdaptorItemHandler.addItems(AdaptorItemHandler.java:237)
    at appeng.util.inv.AdaptorItemHandler.simulateAdd(AdaptorItemHandler.java:223)
    at appeng.helpers.DualityInterface.acceptsItems(DualityInterface.java:1029)
    at appeng.helpers.DualityInterface.pushPattern(DualityInterface.java:950)
    at appeng.me.cluster.implementations.CraftingCPUCluster.executeCrafting(CraftingCPUCluster.java:768)
    at appeng.me.cluster.implementations.CraftingCPUCluster.updateCraftingLogic(CraftingCPUCluster.java:617)
    at appeng.me.cache.CraftingGridCache.onUpdateTick(CraftingGridCache.java:152)
    at appeng.me.GridCacheWrapper.onUpdateTick(GridCacheWrapper.java:43)
    at appeng.me.Grid.update(Grid.java:280)
    at appeng.hooks.TickHandler.onTick(TickHandler.java:228)
    at net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler.ASMEventHandler_701_TickHandler_onTick_TickEvent.invoke(.dynamic)
    at net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler.ASMEventHandler.invoke(ASMEventHandler.java:90)
    at net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler.EventBus.post(EventBus.java:221)
    at net.minecraftforge.fml.common.FMLCommonHandler.onPostServerTick(FMLCommonHandler.java:263)
    at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.tick(MinecraftServer.java:850)
    at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:658)
    at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source报错已经完整了,日志没有其他报错.

我知道删除 热电子工作台 就可以解决这个问题
mod版本是最新的,目测降级不好使
如果你是这样的解决方案,请不要回复我.
